thread.title: Linda Bastille
thread.title_full: Ace Ticket reviewed by Linda Bastille

author: Linda Bastille
title: Linda Bastille
text:
ACE, went above and beyond making my purchase for my Patriots tickets. YES I would recommend this company to everyone I know that purchases sports tickets. I will certainly be back for my next purchase. Oh and the rewards I earned was also an additional nice surprise. And the reminder of my event was another very nice gesture.
Much much thanks,
Linda Bastille
